answerText: mutation[10] This experiment elucidated the nature of mutation by observing E. coli mutating in response to selective pressures. The distribution of mutated bacteria discredited the idea that mutations can be directed instead of random.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 3 | 11 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this process whose types include insertion and deletion. Neutral ones have no effect on fitness.
